abstract: Plight of U Shwe Maung, elected lawmaker in Myanmar who was barred from running for re-election in November after being ruled that as a Rohingya he is not a citizen, illustrates increasing persecution of Muslim minority group; hundreds of thousands of Rohingya in Myanmar have been banned from voting as well.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands of Rohingya who cast votes in elections five years ago are being excluded from voting this November amid rising anti-Muslim sentiment.

headline.main: Myanmar Striking Rohingya From Voter Rolls, Activists Say
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Lawmaker Is Barred From Re-election

snippet: Hundreds of thousands of Rohingya who cast votes in elections five years ago are being excluded from voting this November amid rising anti-Muslim sentiment.
